text: ==Events== * February 22 - The Académie française in Paris is founded as the national academy for the preservation of the French language. * July 31 - The Royal Mail service is made available to the public by King Charles I of England. * August 25 - The Great Colonial Hurricane strikes Narragansett Bay as a possible Category 3 hurricane, killing over 46 people. ===Date unknown=== * Dominica is claimed by France.
